titleStmt.title: Lawes and ordinances touching military discipline Set downe and established the 13. of August. 1590. Translated into English by I. D.
Articulbrief ofte ordonnantie op de discipline militaire. English
titleStmt.author: United Provinces of the Netherlands. Staten Generaal.
Huygens, Christiaan, 1551-1624.
I. D., fl. 1631.

publicationStmt.publisher: By the widowe & heires of the deceased Hillebrand Iacobs van Wouw, ordinarie printer to the high and mightie Lords the Stats Generall,

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Articulbrief ofte ordonnantie op de discipline militaire.
Signed at end: By order of the Councell of State. Chr. Huyghens.
At foot of title page: Cum privilegio.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
